title: The Best Travel Pillows on Amazon, According to Hyperenthusiastic Reviewers
text:
Everlasting Comfort 100% Pure Memory Foam Neck Pillow and Travel Kit

“The memory foam neck pillow is far superior to the neck pillows sold in the airport,” says one reviewer, describing the fit as “snug.” He adds that it “prevents the painful tilting of the head to the side” that plane-sleepers experience as soon as they fall asleep. Another reviewer doesn’t typically sleep on planes because he found it too hard to get comfortable. But he says that “all changed” as soon as he found this pillow.“It really helped me to cinch it up to support my head from bobbing forward or to the side, all while being comfortable with the soft memory foam, instead of those lame pillows with beans/beads in them that don’t have an adjustable front strap and don’t give you much support.” And one more agrees that compared to other options, this one is stellar. “It’s nice enough that it’s memory foam, but it’s very thick (great for wedging your head between the seat and the wall of the train) and it’s contoured in a way that fits nicely around the head and neck,” he writes, though he does warn that it’s bulky and so doesn’t fit easily in a tight carry-on or suitcase. But it’s okay: “I can clip the pillow to the outside and don’t have to worry about carrying it or accidentally dropping it.”
description: The best travel pillows on Amazon, including memory foam pillows, microbead pillows, foldable pillows, pillows for lumbar support, inflatable pillows, compressible pillows, adjustable pillows and more. From brands like Trtl, Aeris, and World’s Best.
